Reviews.Title: Decent phone but buying from Amazon is steadily becoming an issue for me
Reviews.Author: lucky4u
Reviews.Content: Product was NOT new as the website claimed. New means unopen/factory sealed!!! I really wish Amazon.com sellers would stop using misleading text in order to make a profit. Disturbing. Is anyone trustworthy???

Reviews.Title: It's just ok
Reviews.Author: S. Roberts
Reviews.Content: I have tried several phones and this one, although not exactly what i want, I decided to keep it.My main issue with this phone is that it doesn't get good reception in my house. This is an ongoing issue for me even though I have a small one family wood frame house, and get a good signal as soon as I step out the door. I guess I will have to live with this for now.Another problem is the keyboard. Letters are very tiny, especially the ones that have numbers on the top of the key and letters on the bottom. And what makes it much worse is when the keyboard lights up. The keys are white and the lights are light color so it is nearly impossible to see the letters. There doesn't seem to be a way to shut off the lighted keys or change the color.With all previous phones I have been able to insert a picture into a SMS message, but with this one it has to be sent as a MMS. This has to be set up, and I have googled this and am not as of yet able to set this up. So I will have to remove the storage card and download it into my computer. The card is easily accessible,but I would like to be able to send pictures.On the other hand:It's cute. I like the colors. It's a little wider than I am used to but I am sure after time that won't matter. It is pretty thin.It didn't come with a manual, just a startup guide. But I found an entire manual on line, very detailed. Just be sure to look for the one that says it's in English (unless you want another language).The keyboard locks! This one will not start dilaing by mistake in my pocket. But It takes 3 buttons to unlock it.It has more alarms than I could possibly need! I rely on alarms on my phone for everything.I was looking for a bigger screen, but graphics are great.I waited until I had this a month before reviewing it so I could really see what I like and dislike. The biggest flaws are, not being able to send pictures, three buttons to unlock it, I do not see that it has a redial. I have set this aside for now, will use it as a spare. Have gone back to another phone that is more user friendly.

Reviews.Title: something like a Blackberry to me...
Reviews.Author: Shaberraca Colbert
Reviews.Content: loovee the fact it has a full keyboard...and its easy and sleak design that i love, been trynna get a blackjack...n now that i have one,, i love it...so i would rather the phone overall as excellent!

Reviews.Title: NOT RELIABLE OR LONG LASTING....
Reviews.Author: Adonis
Reviews.Content: This phone was good for a while when I first got it. But after a couple months it began lagging a little ... also it doesnt show when I have new text messages. As soon as i dropped it, the back broke. I bought this phone in replacement of my iPhone & i am aware that it was a BIG CHANGE , but it still couldve worked better. On top of THAT , the part where the charger goes in , is broken. EVERY PERSON I KNOW who has this phone has this problem. I guess you can call it a common defect. but I guess the phone isnt the worst phone, but i still suggest you save your money and buy a great phone that will last you long or you'll end up buying a new one every few months like me!

Reviews.Title: Samsung BlackJack II I617 Unlocked Phone
Reviews.Author: Johanna D
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone because I had went through about six android phones in under a year and a half. I wanted something a little older and more reliable, and so far I am very pleased. The phone is unlocked, but it is an AT&T; phone, which is my carrier, so all of the internet features work for me. The shipping was excellent, it came the day after it shipped, and shipped the same day that I purchased it. The screen is a bit small compared to the phones that I am accustomed too, but the font size is customizable, and there is a great zoom feature which works well with my poor vision. The keys can be a bit difficult to see at times since they light up pink, so in medium light it is difficult, but in the light or complete dark the keys are fine. The ringer is loud and the appearance of the phone is cute. All in all, I am glad that I went with this phone, it comes with some great preloaded features, although some (like Myspace) are outdated, there is am app store. I don't plan to use this for internet use though, so I can't comment too much about the mobile web. There are threaded text messages which is nice, and the home screen is very customizable.***UPDATE*** Had to return the phone, it became unresponsive to any type of input except for the on button (which only lights the screen up, does nothing else) am returning the phone.

Reviews.Title: There aren't enough stars!
Reviews.Author: Alta
Reviews.Content: This is the best phone I have ever used and it does everything you could want it to and some you didn't even know you wanted!  It is also pink (mine)which I love because it is the sophisticated cinnamon pink not glaring neon pink.  I like the fact that there is an indicator light that tells you when it is through charging instead of a tone that you might not hear.  It is very easy to use, I have already loaded my music and wallpapers to it along with my contacts just by using the memory card from my other phone which is more easily accessible on this one...you have an outside door instead of it being inside the battery housing.  It is 3G and it is readily synced to other devices and bluetooth.  I love it!

Reviews.Title: Had NO problems
Reviews.Author: Stephbella
Reviews.Content: The phone came to me in PERFECT conditions. It was unlocked and brand new. I was very pleased with this phone! :)

Reviews.Title: Brand
Reviews.Author: Deloras Lozano
Reviews.Content: Samsung brand is good... but this product not a good choise for a cell... cheap made and usage not good.

Reviews.Title: NEVER AGAIN
Reviews.Author: Shona
Reviews.Content: I bought this in hopes that the entire phone would work. Unfortunately, when I receive a call - I am not able to hearthe caller unless I put it on speaker phone.I don't think I will ever purchase a cell phone this way again.BAD RATING!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: It work(s) well.
Reviews.Author: Dina Garrett
Reviews.Content: I'm a big fan of unlocked cell phones which makes it easier to trade out.  I just traded up again but will keep this on hand as a back up or hand it off to a friend to use.

Reviews.Title: Headset damaged and release of the browser
Reviews.Author: Yeison E. Lastre V
Reviews.Content: I've always bought by amazon.com and never had problems, but this time by purchasing two Samsung BlackJack II I617 QWERTY, WM6, GPS, 2 MP camera and 3G support - Phone Unlocked - U.S. Warranty - Pink, because I think Samsung is good brand, but one could not hear anything I had to send it to repair and pay 100 Bs damaged Venezuela (Us $ 23.25) by replacing the same.Outside the U.S. I understand that there is no guarantee and no claim for it, but by the confiaza I deposited in the seller and let me down, because one of its products did not pass quality control or simply was damaged, and do not care reviewOn the other hand I can not browse the mobile internet will not let me access the browser, I need to know how to access the internet from my country Venezuela, if there is an instruction manual please send it to me by email.

Reviews.Title: nice blackberry replacement
Reviews.Author: Lisa Gray "soccer mom"
Reviews.Content: I got this phone to replace my blackberry that had died.  Its lightweight and easy to use.  Very clear menu and love it so far to call, and text.  I do find that reading the light white/pink keys are hard to see.  Am getting old darnit.  Wish I had gotten it in black.

Reviews.Title: ESTAFA
Reviews.Author: keren
Reviews.Content: BUENAS TARDES COMPRE ESTE TLF SAMSUNG Y NO SIRVE. ME DIJERON QUE LA PILA ERA USADA Y AUNQUE LE COMPRE OTRA PILA EL TELEFONO NO PRENDE NI CON FOSFOROS.ES UNA ESTAFA. ME VENDIERON UN TELEFONO MALO.NO SIRVE.NO PRENDE.DEFRAUDADAESTAFADA

Reviews.Title: Too bad for the first time using it.
Reviews.Author: sophia
Reviews.Content: I couldn't turn on the phone even for the first time using.I thought that it's because the battery was empty. Then I waited until it's been fully charged, but the phone still could not be turned on. I returned it right away. It looked good, but it was too bad for a new cell phone!

Reviews.Title: NO Threaded messaging, major down fall
Reviews.Author: Neyuh Mac
Reviews.Content: I ordered it because I read that it does have threaded messaging on a different source, reviewing the same phone... little did I know that, this is the type of phone where you can do a lot to it, if you like to modify, updating and installing programs and such... I am literally not in tune with having to do all the programing myself. The standard features do not include the threaded messaging that I cannot live without. So I rated this phone a 2 star. Other than that, I love the design, the appearance, and the keyboard.

Reviews.Title: It was ok
Reviews.Author: Kirstie
Reviews.Content: I like the phone that i recieve and i recieved it faster than when it was supposed to be here. The only problem i had with it is that the back part of it wouldnt stay on my phone because it had been broken.

Reviews.Title: Complete failure
Reviews.Author: yoyoboy
Reviews.Content: First of all, this phone came with instruction.  However, it didn't indicate that it needs to be charged up for a certain time before use.  I assume that they think this is common knowledge to everybody.It turned out that the phone wouldn't power on.  I tried to hold all the buttons and it wouldn't even show up.This is such an appointment.  It is true that what you pay is what you get.The seller is just trying to get of the inventory.
